overview: Kayyavi is an imaginary or imaginable promise in the life of Salman, hailing from a provincial fishing community who lives and breathes the sea. Evolving along unchosen ways, life invariably finds itself at the starting point as if in a looping dream. What turn will the life of Salman take as Kayyavi begins to unfold like the haze that envelops all of perception..
title: Between One Shore And Several Others
